title: Serif font identification
content:
Hi fellows, I would be glad to get help identifying the serif font on the 4th page of this document: [http://www.upandcomingstyle.com/index.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818004157/http:/www.upandcomingstyle.com/index.pdf "http://www.upandcomingstyle.com/index.pdf")
